alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 23 at 7:53PM MST until January 24 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Along the eastern foothills of the Albuquerque Metro easterly gusts to around 45 mph will persist through the evening. Otherwise east winds will continue to slowly taper down for the rest of the evening. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds can blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
